special_text:
[+2]: Up to one other target nonland permanent phases out until your next upkeep.[i] [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist.[/i])[/i]
[0]: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.
[-4]: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's upkeep, each nonland permanent you control phases out.
[-11]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, choose draw step, main phase, or combat phase. The player skips each instance of the chosen step or phase this turn.”
